page.title: 03A day in the life of Sarah
page.content: On Saturday 22nd June 1985 I got up at 6.30.I made my bed,had my breakfast of cornflakes and toast and watched the tv cartoon until 8.00. I watched the video{TOM AND JERRY}until 9.00. I went and listened to some records FROG CHORUS, NELLIE THE ELEPHANT, CARELESS WHISPER, CREDIT CARD BABY, MOVE CLOSER. I got dressed and went out to play with JUDY DUTTON. We went to the park and played on the swings.We went home, Mummy asked me to go up the shop for some beanos.I had 25p so I had some bubble gum and a cake.I went home and then went swimming at{Greenbank {pool.}I got home in time for dinner.I had sausage chips and baked beans.I then went to{Crispin School fete.}I spent two pounds eighty pence. I went home with my friends.
